Introduction

Hello!
My name is Ali Saim. I am a software developer. This is my portfolio website that I made using Jekyll (HTML, CSS, Font-Awesome, Bootstrap, Javascript, jQuery and Google Apps Mail ).
I made this website because I want to stand out from other students. It would be kinda of funny if like 95% of other students also has portfolio websites for the same reason. I would not be standing out from the rest, I would be amongest the rest. LOL.

Some other technologies and frameworks that I use when building websites include: MVC framework, ASP.NET, WordPress and Dreamweaver. I also use Adobe Photoshop and other image editing software for editing my assets to give my website the clean, polished and professional look.

If you are seeing this website, then please consider hiring me.)
